name: Rakdos
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.Captivating Presence: Any creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of Rakdos must make a DC 25+1d14 + 18 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature becomes charmed by Rakdos for 1 minute or until the creature is farther than 30 feet away from him. On a successful save, the creature becomes immune to Rakdos's Captivating Presence for 24 hours.
traits.Cruel Entertainment: When a creature Rakdos can see within 60 feet of him is reduced to 0 hit points, Rakdos gains 25 temporary hit points.
traits.Legendary Resistance (3/Day): If Rakdos fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.
traits.Magic Resistance: Rakdos has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
